casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sam Babb CLONTS, III 222A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 6, 2018 Daniel M. Blau, Attorney at Law, Robert Hale, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Clonts, Sam Babb (III). Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of February 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of February 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 26th day of February 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
